laboratory_examinations.findings: Right fronto-temporo-insular lesion highly suggestive of a low-grade glioma (nonenhancing hypointense lesion on T1, hyperintense lesion on FLAIR MRI).

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Functional Mapping with Direct Electrical Stimulation (DES)
laboratory_examinations.findings: Stimulation of the pars opercularis elicited an automatic switch from speaking to a singing mode of language production.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: This behavior was consistently reproducible during stimulation and was observed during multiple tasks including naming and mentalizing.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Diagnosis of WHO Grade II astrocytoma.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: No adjuvant treatment was given (no chemotherapy or radiotherapy).
